mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'A' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'B' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'C' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'D' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'E' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'F' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'G' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'H' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'I' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ONOFFRECORD WHERE hvacnum = 'J' ORDER BY onoffrecorddate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
select onoffRecord_seq.nextval as onoffRecordNum from dual
mapper.insert: insert into onoffRecord(onoffRecordNum, hvacNum, onoffYn) values(#{onoffRecordNum}, #{hvacNum}, #{onoffYn})
